name: HYPNO.
description:
You're getting sleepy!!! Apple Watch Fun! Animated Watch... watch the swirling animation, with time.

It won't actually hypnotize you, but it's fun to have the animation running on your watch.

By
JOHNAVATAR.com
Santa Monica, CA 90402

Silicon Beach! Well... actually Rustic Canyon, a few blocks from the beach, in a beautiful canyon, up the wall, looking down on celebrity homes and the ocean.... it's fun up here!
